sentences.en: But it is a sideshow - a way to save jobs ( and votes ) , not restart the economy.
sentences.cn: 不过这是保住一些工作的方法, 而不会振兴经济.

sentences.en: Did you think you could shock me by treating me to this sideshow?
sentences.cn: 你认为用这种杂耍表演就能吓倒我 吗 ?

sentences.en: Instruction is not an educational sideshow.
sentences.cn: 指导在教育中并不是次要的.

sentences.en: Radio work for him was very much a sideshow.
sentences.cn: 对他来说电台的工作只是顺便做做而已。

sentences.en: The Arsenal contingent will provide an intriguing sideshow in Lisbon.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳球员将会在里斯本上演有趣的一幕.

sentences.en: We have decide to make a concession in some sideshow, but not in the important factors.
sentences.cn: 我们准备在一些枝节问题上对他们做些让步, 但决不在重大原则问题上与他们妥协.

trans.tran_cn: （正戏中的）穿插表演，附带游乐项目，附带事件或活动，次要问题或事情
trans.tran_en: a separate small part of a  fair  or  circus  , where you pay to play games or watch a performance
